snippet: The Volkswagen brand was hit in January by its biggest fall in European sales since it was engulfed in a diesel emissions scandal last year.
abstract: European automaker's association ACEA reports January sales for Volkswagen brand cars fell 3.8 percent compared with 2015; says dip is biggest decline since company's emissions duping was discovered.
lead_paragraph: The Volkswagen brand was hit in January by its biggest fall in European sales since it was engulfed in a diesel emissions scandal last year.

headline.print_headline: Volkswagen Brand Sales Fell 3.8 Percent in January
headline.main: Volkswagen Brand Sales Fell 3.8 Percent in January
